entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Oakville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 5:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: ENE 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain changing to ice pellets mixed with freezing rain late this evening and then changing to light snow before morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
